oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two young children pictured on a photographic postcard, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1900
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photographic postcard of two young children, circa 1900, published at the Violet Studio, 15 Arcade, Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of the Helon Daniel Miller Collection. 1 photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Miller, Helon Daniel; Miller family
